sentences: John Parricelli (born 5 April 1959 in Evesham, Wychavon, Worcestershire, England) is a jazz guitarist who has worked mainly in the United Kingdom.
Parricelli began his career as a guitarist in 1982.
In 2011, he appeared on stage with Peter Erskine and John Paul Jones at the Royal Opera House, London, in the opera Anna Nicole.
Rattle That Lock (Columbia Records, 2015)With Ronan Keating
Swings Both Ways (Island Records, 2013)With Colin Towns
